mapper.select: select productNo, productCategory, productName, productPrice, productStock from product
select productNo, productCategory, productName, productPrice, productStock from product where productNo = #{productNo}
select count(*) from product p, category c, category c1 where c.pcategory_no = c1.category_no and p.productCategory = c.NAME and c1.name = #{category}

select A.productNo ,productCategory ,productName ,productPrice ,productStock from (select p.productNo, p.productCategory, p.productName, p.productPrice, p.productStock from product p, category c, category c1 where c.pcategory_no = c1.category_no and p.productCategory = c.NAME and c1.name = #{category}) A LEFT JOIN (select productNo, avg(score) score from review group by productNo) B ON A.productNo=B.productNo
LIMIT #{sc.offset}, 10;
mapper.insert: insert into product (categoryName, productName, price, stock) values (#{categoryName}, #{productName}, #{price}, #{stock})
insert into faq (userId, productNo, question, createdDate) values (#{userId}, #{productNo}, #{question}, now());
update faq set answer = #{answer}, replyDate = now() where faqNo = #{faqNo};
